title: RBI Monetary Policy: RBI governor says monetary policy primarily guided by domestic situation
description:
By

RBI MPC Meet LIVE updates: The central bank kept repo rate unchanged for the seventh consecutive MPC meetings. What it means for you?

RBI Monetary Policy Live: RBI governor Shaktikanta Das announced the repo rate after a meeting of the Monetary Policy Committee.
